2019-09-01.name: Bean Bandit
2019-09-01.desc: Note: A pilot film was shown at Anime Central in May 2019.

2019-09-06.name: Violet Evergarden Gaiden: Eien to Jidou Shuki Ningyou
2019-09-06.desc: Note: The movie received early screenings in Mannheim, Germany, on Aug 3 and Aug 4.

2019-09-10.name: Totsukuni no Shoujo
2019-09-10.desc:
* Based on a dark fantasy shounen manga by Nagabe.

In a world split between the Inside and the Outside, those living in both realms are told never to cross over to the other side, lest they be cursed. A young girl named Shiva lives on the other side, in a vacant village with a demonic guardian known only as "Teacher." Although the two are forbidden to touch, they seem to share a bond that transcends their disparate appearances. But when Shiva leaves Teacher's care to seek out her grandmother, the secret behind her mysterious living arrangement comes to light.

Source: Seven Seas

Note: Bundled with the limited edition of the manga's 8th volume.

2019-09-10.name: Zenonzard: The Animation
2019-09-10.desc:
* Part of Bandai's Zenonzard media franchise with focus on the smartphone card game app.

The year 20XX. Humans called <Concodes> and ultra-high-performance AI called <Codeman> team up as buddies to compete in the card battle game ZENOZARD. People are going wild with excitement at the world championships, THE ZENON.
One day, Azuma Souta, an average high school student, is challenged to a battle by a mysterious woman, Eilietta Lash. She reveals that she's a Codeman and that her intent is to team up with Souta and participate in THE ZENON. Souta reluctantly agrees. Souta and Eilietta's first opponent turns out to be the super-famous player Saionji Shion, who attends Sota's school, and her buddy, Ash Claude.

Source: Zenonzard YouTube channel

2019-09-18.name: Yuru Yuri Ten
2019-09-18.desc:
* Based on a manga series written and illustrated by Namori.

Note: A Blu-ray Disc of the OVA was delivered on September 18 to backers who participated in a related crowdfunding campaign. Its retail sale started on November 13.

2019-09-20.name: Hello World
2019-09-20.desc:
In Kyoto in the year 2027, Naomi Katagaki, a male high school student encounters a person who claiming to be Naomi from 10 years in the future. Together, they must change the future and save a classmate, Ruri, whom the younger Naomi starts to date in three months.

Source: ANN

2019-09-25.name: Kandagawa Jet Girls
2019-09-25.desc:
* An original multimedia project by Kadokawa, Marvelous, and Egg Firm.

"Jet-Racing"” has become a mega-popular extreme sport across the world, and with good reason! The "Jetter" pilots a high velocity watercraft and is paired with a "Shooter" who blasts rival teams with a hydro gun. It all adds up to explosive, wet-and-wild action as they race to the finish and compete to earn supremacy. Among those competing is Namiki Rin, and racing is in her blood. Rin aspires to become a legendary Jetter just like her mother, and after meeting the cool and gorgeous Shooter Aoi Misa, it looks like Rin's dreams are finally in reach with a partner who shares her passion! Every race brings them tighter together as a team and closer than ever to their dream of becoming the best Jet Racers on the water.

Source: Sentai Filmworks

Note: The first episode received an advance web delivery on 25.09. The regular TV broadcast started on 08.10.2019.

2019-09-25.name: Mob Psycho 100: Daiikkai Rei toka Soudansho Ian Ryokou - Kokoro Mitasu Iyashi no Tabi
2019-09-25.desc:
Mob, Reigen, Dimple, and the newest member of the Spirits and Such Consultation Office staff, Serizawa, take a trip up to a secluded hot spring called Ibogami Hot Springs in Zebra Prefecture. Reigen happened to get a request from the matron there to discover the truth behind the strange rumors going around there and save the inn. Ritsu and Teru also join in on this trip and the six of them head out on this super relaxing trip to the hot spring. But on their way there, Reigen and Serizawa start nodding off on the train and somehow get sucked into an eerie parallel world...

Source: crunchyroll

Note: It received a special screening at Crunchyroll Expo 2019. In Japan it received a special screening at an anime event that took place at Kasukabe Citizens Cultural Center in Saitama Prefecture on 07.07.2019.

2019-09-26.name: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desuka?? Sing for You

2019-09-27.name: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu: Die Neue These (2019)
2019-09-27.desc:
A disastrous expedition led by Free Planets Alliance Fleet Admiral Lassalle Lobos and cunningly crushed by Galactic Empire Fleet Admiral Reinhard von Lohengramm has brought devastating damage onto a thirty-million-men strong Alliance fleet. The crushing blow dealt to the forces under him doesn't seem to faze Lobos, however, on whose orders the survivors now assemble together in order to strike again. As the remainders of what was once a mighty force over half the entire Alliance Space Fleet are at the very end of their rope, Vice Admiral Yang Wenli must now fight to save as many of his country's troops as he possibly can. Moreover, before the current battle is even over, political trouble that will shake the entire galaxy to its core is getting ready to brew...

— written by Hinoe

2019-09-27.name: Kaijuu Step Wandabada
2019-09-27.desc:
The Kaiju of the ULTRAMAN series, are not just enemies defeated by the heroes. Each has their own special powers, looks, and characteristics which make them all unique. These characters are popular along with the Ultra Heroes.

The main characters of "KAIJU STEP" are the "little Kaiju". The characters are designed as though the popular Kaiju in the ULTRAMAN series have become little kids. The story is set in the "little planet" where the unique "little Kaiju" try new things, meet new friends and portray each of their little "first steps".

Source: Tsuburaya Productions

2019-09-27.name: Sound & Fury
2019-09-27.desc:
* Okazaki Takashi (Afro Samruai) and Mizusaki Junpei (Batman Ninja) team up for the first time with Sturgill Simpson (Grammy Award-winning musician, A Sailor's Guide to Earth) on a new film that merges American rock music with anime in a way never seen before.

In this anime visual album, a mysterious driver heads deep into a postapocalyptic hellscape toward a ferocious showdown with two monstrous opponents.

Source: netflix

2019-09-28.name: Hoshiai no Sora
2019-09-28.desc: Note: The first episode received an advance web delivery on 28.09. The regular TV broadcast started on 11.10.2019.

2019-09-28.name: Shinchou Yuusha: Kono Yuusha ga Ore Tsueee Kuse ni Shinchou Sugiru
2019-09-28.desc:
* Based on a light novel series written by Tsuchihi Light and illustrated by Toyota Saori.

Young goddess Ristarte isn't sure if she lucked out or not when she's chosen as the goddess in charge of finding a hero to save S-ranked world Gaeabrande. She's only summoned five heroes before, and never for a world of this difficulty. Because of the prevalence and popularity of isekai novels in Japan, she decides to summon a Japanese hero to help her, and eventually stumbles across the stats of Ryuuguuin Seiya, who stands out not only for his unusual name, but also his high starting scores. Rista quickly summons him, but it turns out that she really should have read the fine print – Seiya may be powerful, but he's also overly cautious to a fault, refusing to even set foot in Gaeabrande until he's exercised his way to a higher level. When he won't even eat the food Rista makes for him in case she might be trying to poison him, Rista realizes that she may be in trouble with this guy...

Source: ANN

Note: The first episode received an advance web delivery on 28.09. The regular TV broadcast started on 02.10.2019.

2019-09-29.name: Hataage! Kemono Michi
2019-09-29.desc:
Pro-wrestler Shibata Genzo who's a pet animals maniac was suddenly summoned to a different world. Genzo was asked by the princess to get rid of the evil beasts called monsters roaming in this world. Outraged that he was asked to kill monsters, he german suplexed the princess. Unable to get back to earth, he decided to live a slow peaceful life in this world. This is a story about an eccentric Japanese man who was a former pro wrestler and manages a "Monster Pet" shop.

Source: M-U

Note: The first episode received an advance broadcast on AT-X on September 29. The regular broadcast started on October 2.
